schema_purpose: PRA (Probabilistic Risk Assessment) schema defining data structures for nuclear power plant risk analysis
main_relationships: Events can be basic or complex
Assumptions can be linked to multiple elements
Barriers can be intact, breached, degraded, or bypassed
Common Cause Failures affect multiple components
Data Analysis includes parameter estimation and uncertainty quantification
Peer Reviews track findings and their resolution
critical_constraints: Dates must be in ISO format
